dmca.title: Google DMCA - Scott Buresh
dmca.body:
Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043

Sent via Fax to 650.963.3255

Re: Notice of Copyright Infringement

December 21, 2006

RE: NOTICE OF COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT

As the owner of copyrighted material, I, Scott Buresh, am writing to inform you of copyright infringement of that material.

The copyrighted material in question is an article authored by me entitled "Organic SEO or Pay-per-Click Advertising: Which Should You Choose?". The article, in its entirety, can be viewed at:

http://www.mediumblue.com/newsletters/organic-search.html and http://www.searchenuineguide.com/buresh/2006/1027_sbl.html

Infringing Parties and Sites
The copyrighted material appears without permission at the following sites:

Google Search Query:	"Organic SEO or Pay per Click"
Infringing Web Pages:
http://www.graingeruk.com/index.php?option=com_content&task=view&id=3l&Itemid=36

While no email address is published at the site, the site does have a contact form that allows one to email the company. The form can be found at
http://www.grainueruk.com/index.php?option=com contact&Itemid=3

Author's Contact Information
You can contact me at sburesh@mediumblue.com or 670 Eleventh Street, Atlanta, GA 30318 or 404-525-4420.

Assertion and Affirmation
As the author of the article in question, the use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by me, the copyright owner, or any agent acting on my behalf. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in this notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner of the article.

Sincerely,

Scott Buresh
